ManagedDeviceMessage: This device is managed by your organization.
AccessibilityPermissionDescription: Required to remote control your device.
ScreenCapturePermissionDescription: Required to view your device's screen.
ScreenCastPermissionDescription: Required to capture and share your screen via XDG Desktop Portal.
RemoteControlPermissionDescription: Required for screen capture and input simulation via XDG Desktop Portal.
NotificationPermissionDescription: Required to show notifications and alerts.
RemoteControlSessionToastMessage: {0} has connected and is now sharing your screen.
NewChatMessageToastMessage: You have a new message from {0}.
ChatWindowClosedSystemMessage: System Message: User closed the chat window.
NoMessagesText: No messages yet. Send a message to start the conversation.
ChatSessionClosedToastMessage: The chat session has been closed by the remote user.
PermissionsMissingToastMessage: Required permissions are missing. Click here to enable.
